Text: the last 2 releases by ZMG have produced DTS dropouts on my receiver.  never had this happen before.  only fix is convert the DTS to AC3.

optional Audio Tracks

Deutsch   AC3 448
Espanol   AC3 284
Francais   DTS 768
Italiano   AC3 384
Magyar      AC3 384
Portuges (Br)  AC3 384
Russian        AC3 448
Ukrainian   AC3 384

you can download from
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6484835/Knight_and_Day_%282010%29_BDRip_1080p_9_audios_multisub
They are separate (demuxed) so skip all other files from download.
